trans-unit.source: Could not create document, access denied.
Here you can explain or justify your suggestion.
Document couldn't be saved. File size limit exceeded:
Document couldn't be saved. Error while uploading files.
%s could not be released, access denied.
Releasing %s failed. There is a newer Version.
Deleting %s failed. There is a newer Version.
%s could not be deleted, because it is currently being edited.
%s could not be deleted, access denied.
%s could not be discarded. There is a newer version.
%s could not be discarded, because it is currently being edited.
%s could not be discarded, access denied.
%s could not be postponed. There is a newer version.
%s could not be postponed, because it is currently being edited.
%s could not be postponed, access denied.
The document could not be duplicated.
%s could not be duplicated, access denied.
Updating %s failed. There is a newer version.
Registering %s failed, missing Information. Please fill in all required fields.
Suggesting changes for %s failed, access denied.
Suggesting restore of %s failed, access denied.
Couldn't get a valid Document id from the repository.
The connection to the repository server failed.
The connection to the search server failed.
Retrieve failed. Title or document type wasn't found.
The maximum number of %s characters has been exceeded.
Please fill in the required fields.
Please fill out at least one of the fields.
We have added you as the author of this publication. Please check the information and confirm the change.
Secondary File (Format: PDF / PDF/A et al.)
The document "%s" will be marked as active in the repository.
Do you really want to activate the document?
Here you can submit suggestions for changes to existing records. You can upload related files and recover from discarded records. Please enter your changes directly in the appropriate fields.

For data sets for which no file is available yet, you can upload a file for publication here. Please also accept the declaration of consent. It is not possible to exchange or remove existing files here. If you wish so, please contact us.
The document "%s" will be removed from the local list and therefore all changes are rejected. Documents in the repository remain unchanged.
Do you really want to delete the document?
The document "%s" will be registered for publication.
Do you really want to register the selected documents?
The selected documents will be registered for publication.
The document "%s" will be taken into processing.
Do you really want to take the document into processing?
Do you really want to take the selected documents into processing?
The selected documents will be taken into processing.
The document "%s" will be deleted completely. This cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete the document completely?
The suggestion and any attached files are completely deleted. This cannot be reversed.
Do you really want to delete the suggestion?
If the suggestion came from the FIS, you can state a reason for the rejection here:
The document "%s" will be deleted completely. This cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete the working copy completely?
The document "%s" will be registered for publication.
Do you really want to register the document?
Do you really want to register the selected documents?
The selected documents will be registered for publication.
Do you really want to remove the selected documents?
The selected documents will be removed from your workspace.
Do you really want to release and validate the selected documents?
The selected documents will be released and validated.
Do you really want to release but not validate the selected documents?
The selected documents will be released but not validated.
Do you really want to bookmark the selected documents?
The selected documents will be bookmarked.
Do you really want to remove the document from the list?
The selected documents will be removed from the list.
The document "%s" will be marked as discarded.
Do you really want to discard the document?
The document "%s" will be marked as postponed.
Do you really want to postpone the document processing?
The document has been discarded: %s Reason: %s
The document has been postponed: %s Reason: %s
The document "%s" will be marked as inactive in the repository.
Do you really want to inactivate the document?
The document "%s" will be sent to the repository and the local document will be discarded.
Do you really want to publish the document?
The document "%s" will be marked as inactive in the repository.
Do you really want to restore the document?
Please select a client in the page tree.
Originated from scientific work at the UL
%s record out of %s successfully taken into processing.
%s records out of %s successfully taken into processing.
The desired action is not possible for your selection.
Record has been removed from workspace.
%s Records have been removed from workspace.
Record has been added to the workspace.
A publication with this identifier is already in the "Workspace". Nothing was imported.
A publication with this identifier is already in "My Publications". Nothing was imported.
A publication with this identifier is already in the system. It has been added to „Workspace”. Please check the entry there.
A publication with this identifier is already in the system. It has been added to „My Publications”. Please check the entry there.
The publication was imported. Please check that all information is correct and identify people who belong to the university of Leipzig.
The publication was imported. Please check that all information is correct and identify people who belong to the university of Leipzig.
The search was unsuccessful. Please use the manual entry.
%s %s were imported and %s existing %s added to "Workspace".
%s %s were imported and %s existing %s added to "My Publications".
Please identify yourself and other researchers if necessary. To do this, click on names that have not yet been marked with the [Person] symbol. If your own name is missing, click on the [+] symbol.

To complete the import, please check whether your own name has been correctly recognized and, if necessary, identify other researchers. To do this, click on names that are not yet highlighted in color. If your own name is missing, click on the [+] symbol.
Could not import publication number %s%s, because the following fields are empty: %s
Import failed. An error occurred while uploading the file.
